current workers are located. In a speech Tuesday, Mr. Eric Schmidt said Google Inc. will hire more than 1,000 workers in Europe this year. All told, Google Inc. has more than 60 offices in 30 countries. At this stage, the number of opportunities just vastly exceed the number of people we have at the company, said Alan Eustace , Google Inc. 's senior vice president of engineering and research. Even if it surpasses 31,000 employees this year, Google Inc. will still have far fewer people than Microsoft Corp., probably its fiercest rival.

. By this summer, developers with games on Facebook's platform will have to accept payments made with the social network's own in-house currency, Facebook Credits. By requiring game developers to offer Facebook Credits, it brings them inline with what you see on other gaming platforms such as Microsoft or Nintendo, said Todd Northcutt of GameSpy Technology. In Washington, Donald Rumsfeld was known as a tenacious and effective fighter of policy wars, once described by Henry Kissinger as a skilled full-time politician-bureaucrat in whom ambition, ability, and substance fuse seamlessly. .'' David Letterman : ''What is your greatest asset, when you get out there, in a Super Bowl, in an exhibition game, what is your greatest asset?''
